attributes.action: Evict Planet circus from princess park in Southport and any surrounding areas.
attributes.additional_details: not only is this park now ruined by loud circus music and obnoxious menaces dredged in makeup), but the circus's advertising techniques are despicable! anything considered unacceptable is fine for them! Drive around blaring air horns playing music? Check! Post your gangs tag wherever possible, check, shine a bright, reasonably concentrated light into the sky? Check! if I did that with my laser I would be arrested, but since its only an extremely powerful spotlight owned by a circus its ok!
attributes.background: The circus is in town (Southport),  for 2 weeks. and it needs to go. its causing annoyance to many residence and is a menace that needs to be put in its place.  This egotistical nightmare has come into Southport between the 4th of April and the 17th of April and has placed itself in princess park.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the issue your raise. This would be the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:
https://www.sefton.gov.uk/your-council/councillors,-meetings,-decisions/petitions.aspx
